name: portal-unleashed-generator
description: A JavaScript lib for Battlefield Portal Unleashed
author: Ludonope <ludonope@nopestudio.fr>

scripts.generate: tsc && node intermediate/main.js && shx cp res/package.json res/tsconfig.json res/webpack.config.js portal-unleashed
scripts.build: npm generate && cd portal-unleashed && npm install && npm build
